long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate skill names and skill descriptions in https://ryu.sega-online.jp/ from Japanese to Chinese.

When searching for terms, translate Chinese names back to Japanese names. For example, if the user wants to search for "理查森", it will be replaced by "リチャードソン" automatically. Bellow are some more examples (in the form Chinese => Japanese):
* 解降 => マイナス効果解除
* 連合戰 => ドンパチ
* 重傷 => 打撲
* 連擊架式 => 連撃の構え
* 攻擊陣 => 攻撃の陣
* Boss刺殺 => ボス闇討

Note that not all skill names and skill descriptions are translated.
